author: Fred Kelsey
comment: I had a problem with the reindeer animation and sent an email describing the problem to development and got an answer with detailed instructions on how to solve the problem within a few hours. I was very impressed with the prompt and detailed response. The watch face is also very cool.  I have a few other Husky watch faces and enjoy and use them all.

author: CK Woods
comment: Seeing as how I won't be using this app after Christmas, it should be free till Christmas, then locked. Or maybe if you have other premium husky faces it should be free. At least users would see what they're missing and purchase other premium faces. Just a thought.

author: Diana Woodrow
comment: HELLO..  My husband put this cute app on his watch today.. I did the same and also I paid for Premium .. so where is my sleigh/reindeer with the countdown...??? I will put a rating when they appear :-(

reply.author: HuskyDev
reply.content:
Hi Diana, please contact me at huskydevcz@gmail.com, I will send you more information how to resolve this issue. 
Best regards
Pavel

author: Michael MacLeod
comment: None off countdowns or merry Christmas animations ever appeared.

author: Gary & Keri Hazen
comment: This is a great app. It has a wide array of features, and it works. I would just wish that the active screen was on longer in order to see the animations in action.

author: barbara Mannell
comment: I have no sleigh, other than that it's fine

author: Mark Wharton
comment: No Rudolf! Downloaded app and paid premium! No Rudolf countdown animation! Being used on moto 360.

author: Dmitry Krasnokutsky
comment: A very nice application craftily made!

author: Norm Anderson
comment: I like it did a full reset on watch and phone all is great
